earningBands.label: Entry
earningBands.description: Typical starting wages for many entry level roles. Pay is often modest at first but can grow as experience and responsibilities increase.

earningBands.label: Moderate
earningBands.description: Wages that are generally stable and competitive for early and mid career roles, especially in smaller communities or entry professional positions.

earningBands.label: Good
earningBands.description: Solid earnings with potential for growth over time. Many roles in this band support long term, sustainable careers with paths into more senior positions.

earningBands.label: Strong
earningBands.description: Higher earnings for roles that typically require more responsibility, specialization, or experience. Some positions in this band can lead to leadership or advanced professional careers.

opportunityBands.label: Limited
opportunityBands.description: Fewer local openings or more competition for available roles. Opportunities may exist but can be more specialized or concentrated in certain locations.

opportunityBands.label: Steady
opportunityBands.description: Regular turnover and hiring activity. Graduates can expect a consistent but moderate level of opportunities over time.

opportunityBands.label: Good
opportunityBands.description: Healthy demand with ongoing openings across multiple employers or regions. Skills often transfer across different organizations and sectors.

opportunityBands.label: Strong
opportunityBands.description: High demand and broad employment opportunities. Multiple sectors are hiring, and graduates with related experience are likely to see strong prospects.
